snippet: The London museum will stay open around the clock for the exhibition, which surveys the career of the fashion designer Alexander McQueen and closes on Aug. 2.
abstract: The London museum will stay open around the clock for the exhibition, which surveys the career of the fashion designer Alexander McQueen and closes on Aug. 2.

headline.main: ‘Savage Beauty’ at V&A Museum to Open Continuously for Last 2 Weekends
headline.print_headline: V&A Museum Stays Open For ‘Savage Beauty’
